name: Bot_Status_Checker
description: Easy & powerful bot to check if all your Telegram bots are working or not. This bot status checker updates every 15 minutes and runs 24x7.
keywords: Check if your bots are alive or not

API_ID.description: Get your API ID from https://my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: Get your API Hash from https://my.telegram.org/apps

SESSION_STRING.description: A valid Pyrogram session string. Generate this using any Pyrogram session generator.

BOT_LIST.description: List of your bot usernames without '@' (Example: bot1 bot2 bot3). Separate each username with a space.

BOT_LIST1.description: List of your bot usernames without '@' (Example: bot1 bot2 bot3). Separate each username with a space.

CHANNEL_OR_GROUP_ID.description: The Telegram ID of your channel or group (Example: -1001246808642).

MESSAGE_ID.description: The ID of the message in your channel or group where the status updates will be posted (Example: 10). Need help? Contact @SparkSupport.

BOT_ADMIN_IDS.description: IDs of the bot admins who should be notified if a bot is down. Separate multiple IDs with a space (Example: 1356107531 2460197531 3579864241).
